channel.title: September-2025 on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in September-2025 on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: vscode: September 2025 (version 1.105)
item.description:
This is the release announcement for Visual Studio Code September 2025 (version 1.105). It directs readers to the full article for details about what’s new in this release, including feature updates, improvements, fixes, and extension or API changes.

  • Source: Visual Studio Code

item.title: ai: What’s new in Azure AI Foundry | September 2025
item.description:
Azure AI Foundry’s September 2025 update announces GA for GPT-5-Codex and Voice Live, previews for Sora video-to-video, Browser Automation, and Key Vault, the release of Grok 4 Fast, and new knowledge sources for Azure AI Search.

  • Source: Microsoft AI Foundry Blog

item.title: github: Secret Protection expands default pattern support – September 2025
item.description:
GitHub updated the Secret Protection default pattern set in September 2025, adding new secret detection patterns and upgrading existing ones to improve coverage across different secret types. The changes expand built-in secret scanning so repositories using the default patterns benefit from broader, more accurate detection without manual configuration.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio — September update
item.description:
The September 2025 GitHub Copilot update for Visual Studio adds new Profiler and .NET Modernization agents, enhances MCP interactions, and introduces smarter code review capabilities to speed debugging, modernization, and developer workflows.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: dotnet: .NET and .NET Framework September 2025 servicing releases updates
item.description:
This is a short recap announcing the September 2025 servicing updates for .NET and .NET Framework. The post summarizes the latest patches and maintenance updates and directs readers to the .NET Blog for full details and download guidance.

  • Source: .NET
